item.description:
Members of this meetup should have multiple opportunities to see the best films. This is a film that cannot be missed. Since I cannot make the group's viewing on Super Sunday, I'd like to invite anyone to see this film with me on Wednesday, February 6 for a matinee priced showing.

Nothing better than to leave work and enjoy a gut wrenching, emotionally draining film! Afterwards, we'll go to a local place to eat, drink, and process the experience. This is the kind of film that requires an emotional outlet afterwards!

Winner of the Palme d'Or at the 2007 Cannes Film Festival, this unforgettable drama is so gripping it plays like a thriller. Set during the last year of the Ceau√ßescu dictatorship, ironically called the "Golden Age of Romania," life has become a nightmare for the hard-pressed citizens. The film reveals how oppression infects every aspect of the culture. A political, moral and spiritual knockout. Written and directed by Cristian Mungiu

Transpiring over the course of a single day, Mungiu's film is a masterwork of modern filmmaking, by parts poignant and shocking. Nominated for 4 European Film Awards including Best Picture and one of the standout hits of the Telluride, Toronto and New York Film Festivals, 4 MONTHS, 3 WEEKS AND 2 DAYS is a modern classic that will stay with you long after you've left the theater.

Before you leave the theater, look for me down front holding 2 meetup signs. Or, I'll hold one sign in 2 pieces. I tried to do this 3 weeks ago, and have wanted to see this film four months.

John
item.how_to_find_us: I will be standing at the front of the theater near the 4th seat in the 3rd row holding 2 Meetup signs.
item.why: What better way to experience a film that is said to 'floor you' but with a group of film fans to discuss it afterwards?
item.name: 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days
